trans-unit.source: Azure Batch development libraries and tools | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure Batch development libraries and tools | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Get the libraries and tools you need to develop Azure Batch applications
trans-unit.target: Get the libraries and tools you need to develop Azure Batch applications

trans-unit.source: Azure Batch development libraries and tools
trans-unit.target: Azure Batch development libraries and tools

trans-unit.source: <html></html> Get these libraries and tools to develop Azure Batch applications.
trans-unit.target: <html></html> Get these libraries and tools to develop Azure Batch applications.

trans-unit.source: Batch
trans-unit.target: Batch

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Batch Client Library for .NET</linkText><title></title></link> (NuGet) – Develop client applications to run jobs with the Batch service
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Batch Client Library for .NET</linkText><title></title></link> (NuGet) – Develop client applications to run jobs with the Batch service

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Batch Management Library</linkText><title></title></link> (NuGet) – Manage Batch accounts
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Batch Management Library</linkText><title></title></link> (NuGet) – Manage Batch accounts

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Batch Explorer</linkText><title></title></link> (GitHub) - GUI application and sample to browse, access, and update major elements within a Batch account, including jobs and tasks, compute nodes and pools, and files on a compute node.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Batch Explorer</linkText><title></title></link> (GitHub) - GUI application and sample to browse, access, and update major elements within a Batch account, including jobs and tasks, compute nodes and pools, and files on a compute node.

trans-unit.source: See the <link><linkText>blog post</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: See the <link><linkText>blog post</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Batch Apps
trans-unit.target: Batch Apps

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Batch Apps Cloud SDK</linkText><title></title></link> (NuGet) – Enable applications to offload jobs to the Batch service
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Batch Apps Cloud SDK</linkText><title></title></link> (NuGet) – Enable applications to offload jobs to the Batch service

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Batch Apps Visual Studio Extension</linkText><title></title></link> (Visual Studio Gallery) – Cloud-enable applications in Visual Studio using the Batch Apps Cloud SDK
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Batch Apps Visual Studio Extension</linkText><title></title></link> (Visual Studio Gallery) – Cloud-enable applications in Visual Studio using the Batch Apps Cloud SDK

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Batch Apps Client SDK</linkText><title></title></link> (NuGet) – Interact with applications enabled to offload jobs to the Batch service
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Batch Apps Client SDK</linkText><title></title></link> (NuGet) – Interact with applications enabled to offload jobs to the Batch service

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Batch Apps Python Client</linkText><title></title></link> (GitHub) - Python client module to interact with applications set up in a Batch Apps service
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Batch Apps Python Client</linkText><title></title></link> (GitHub) - Python client module to interact with applications set up in a Batch Apps service

trans-unit.source: Azure will only release the Batch Apps API as a Preview.
trans-unit.target: Azure will only release the Batch Apps API as a Preview.

trans-unit.source: You should only develop with it for test or proof-of-concept projects.
trans-unit.target: You should only develop with it for test or proof-of-concept projects.

trans-unit.source: Key Batch Apps capabilities will be integrated into the Batch API in future service releases.
trans-unit.target: Key Batch Apps capabilities will be integrated into the Batch API in future service releases.
